alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 8:23AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...From Monday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Several thousand acres of agricultural and lowland become inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 18.0 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Black River West 15.0 8.7 Sun 7 am CDT 13.7 17.8 17.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CDT.
